Name: Academy
Description:
Infantry-production facility.

Enables:
- Pretorian
- Commando
- Bunkers from MCSs
- Science Facilities from MCSs
- Shadow Ops at the MCSs
- Workshop at the MCSs

Root.Tooltip:
General-purpose infantry.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Train Pretorian

Root.Tooltip:
Anti-light Raider. Can jump up and down cliffs. Use K8 Charge against buildings.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Train Commando

Root.Tooltip:
Heavy close combat anti-armor assault infantry, can use Corrosive Blast.

Can attack ground units.
Root.Name: Train Plasmabat

Root.Tooltip:
Support robot. Can use Transfer Shield Power, can be upgraded to use Disruption Web

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Build Harmoniser

Root.Tooltip: Sends constructed units to the designated point. Workers rallied to resources will begin gathering automatically.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip:
Warp the building to the targeted powered location.
Takes 20.0/17.9 seconds to finish at Power Level 2/3.

Warning: once Warping is triggered, it cannot be canceled.
This will also cancel any ongoing production.
Root.Name: Warp to Location

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +15% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +30% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +45% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 3

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +15% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +30% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +45% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 2

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +15% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +30% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +45% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 1

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +15% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +30% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +45% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Normal Power Level

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip:
Infiltration unit. Permanently Cloaked, can use Snipe, Sabotage, and be upgraded to use Lockdown. Can call down Tactical Nukes built at the Shadow Ops.

Can attack ground and air units.
Root.Name: Train Shadowguard
